name: Superhero
overview: Superhero is a platform Beat'em Up game by Kage that was intended to be available in 1993, a playable demo was released that year as a coverdisk in THE ONE magazine in February 1993. Previewed in CU Amiga, Amiga Joker, and The Games Machine magazines. It was Advertised in Amiga Power issue 23, page 15. The game was planned for the SNES and MegaDrive too, but the Amiga version was the only one that was completed. Reportedly Full versions were given to reviewers but aside from the demo release it never was distributed.
